game.author: ryvnf
game.name: mineclonia

game.title: Mineclonia

long_description:
This is a mod that adds 4 new music discs to the game: "minimal," "depado," "krank," and "phlips," all of which were produced by C418 and released under CC-By 3.0 licenses. "minimal" and "depado" come from C418's album [circle](https://c418.bandcamp.com/album/circle), and "krank" and "phlips" come from [zweitonegoismus](https://c418.bandcamp.com/album/zweitonegoismus).

This mod requires Mineclone 2, more specifically mcl_jukebox, to run. It will likely also work with Mineclone 5, but this hasn't been tested.
name: mcl_jukebox_c418
short_description: Adds 4 new records: "minimal", "krank", "depado", and "phlips", songs all produced by C418 and released under CC-By 3.
title: Mineclone 2 C418 Records
